title: Non rank position section
body: I have been wondering for a while now as to why isn't there a pre section spot in normal games like there is in ranked. I feel there should also be the same system just the fact you can practice a siren roll before playing in ranked so they you do not upset other players playing ranked if your not good at a champ or the roll you selected. I have found that if its mid or top there is always fights and q leavers because they don't get that spot or champ they would like to practice or learn. Could there be a though in adding it in there as well?

replies.body:
There was Team Builder queue, but Riot killed it since not a lot of people used it.

> [{quoted}](name=darthpav,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=kyJGooba,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-16T04:39:35.191+0000)
>
> I have been wondering for a while now as to why isn&#039;t there a pre section spot in normal games like there is in ranked.

Normal Draft is what I think you are referring to. It is available on other regions like, North America, but we don't have it here in Oceania.

{{champion:17}}

Yeah normal games is what i am referring to. i feel that it might make  rank games a bit better because u can at least practice the roll or champ u would like to play. 

is it working for the other regions? is there any plans in to bring it into oceania?

> [{quoted}](name=darthpav,realm=OCE,application-id=PpTM71nT,discussion-id=kyJGooba,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-11-05T21:23:51.534+0000)
>
> Yeah normal games is what i am referring to. i feel that it might make  rank games a bit better because u can at least practice the roll or champ u would like to play. 
> 
> is it working for the other regions? is there any plans in to bring it into oceania?

At the start of preseason, Normal Draft will only be available in North America, Europe West, and Brazil. Riot also stated that: "In an ideal world, weâ€™d like to retire normal draft in all regions."

Link to Riot's post [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season).

{{champion:17}}
